column4: Plz tell me I hav installed ubuntu alongside with windows XP. No my windows xp is not working properly. Question is this if I format C then whether the boot loader show ubuntu or not?
you first installed windows and then ubuntu? should work but as always first do the backup!
you _need_ to backup first and installing windows after linux will delete GRUB which needs to be fixed
if you worry about losing your ubuntu installation, get a hard disk and copy everything important to it, disconnect and store safely, then resume with the installations
